name: Quick-Save Adventure
description:
Quick-Save Adventure is a little game made for the Brackeys game jam 2021 and my first "complete" game.

In this game we have control over an adventurer which is tired of the villagers who pester him all the time when he arrives to a village. So he proceeds to save the game and unleash hell on the village.

Thank you for playing it, I hope you enjoy it and if you want, leave a comment with which things you enjoyed or hated and how can this mini game be better.

Thanks to: 

  • Pixel-Boy and AAA for the ninja adventure asset pack.
  • TheWiseHedgehog for the Swordtember icon set.
  • Caz for the pixel fantasy rpg icons rtp equipment asset pack.
  • J. D. Jimenez for the avenue pixel font.
  • anjuu for the 1Bit Control Prompts.
  • xDeviruchi for the 8-bit Fantasy & Adventure Music (2021) pack.
  • RGS_Dev for the Animated top down character base template.
  • LoudEyes for the paper ui pack.
  • OmegaPixelArt for the Gameboy SFX Pack 1.
